parts.text: {"word":"shackled","priority":"★★☆","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vt","definition":"(足かせ、手かせなどで)束縛する、拘束する","english_definition":"to restrain or confine with shackles.","examples":[{"sentence":"The prisoners were shackled to the wall.","translation":"囚人たちは壁に足かせでつながれていた。"},{"sentence":"His legs were shackled so he couldn't run.","translation":"彼の足は走れないように足かせで拘束されていた。"}],"collocations":["shackled to (～に足かせでつながれている)","shackled hand and foot (手足を縛られている)"],"synonyms":["fettered","restrained","bound","manacled","chained"],"antonyms":["freed","liberated","unbound"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vt","definition":"(比喩的に)束縛する、妨げる、制限する","english_definition":""(figuratively) to impede, restrain, or hinder.","examples":[{"sentence":"The company was shackled by bureaucracy.","translation":"その会社は官僚主義に縛られていた。"},{"sentence":"He felt shackled by his responsibilities.","translation":"彼は自分の責任に縛られていると感じた。"},{"sentence":"The economy is shackled by high taxes.","translation":"経済は高い税金によって阻害されている。"}],"collocations":["shackled by (～によって束縛されている)","shackled to tradition (伝統に縛られている)"],"synonyms":["hindered","impeded","constrained","restricted","hampered"],"antonyms":["liberated","freed","empowered"]},{"part_of_speech":"adjective","definition":"足かせをはめられた、束縛された","english_definition":"restrained or confined by shackles; figuratively, restricted or hindered.","examples":[{"sentence":"The shackled prisoner was led away.","translation":"足かせをはめられた囚人が連れ去られた。"},{"sentence":"He felt shackled and unable to pursue his dreams.","translation":"彼は束縛され、夢を追うことができないと感じた。"}],"collocations":["shackled hands (足かせをはめられた手)","shackled feet (足かせをはめられた足)","shackled spirit (束縛された精神)"],"synonyms":["fettered","restrained","bound","constrained","restricted"],"antonyms":["free","unrestrained","unbound","liberated"]}],"etymology":{"value":"「shackle」という単語から派生。shackleは古英語の「sceacel」に由来し、これは「足かせ、手かせ」を意味する。","priority":"★★☆"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/ˈʃækəld/","syllables":"shack-led"},"inflection":{"verb_forms":{"present_simple":["shackle","shackles"],"past_simple":"shackled","past_participle":"shackled","present_participle":"shackling"}},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"「**shackled**」は、物理的な拘束（足かせや手かせ）と比喩的な拘束の両方を表すことができます。比喩的な意味では、自由や進歩を妨げるもの、制限するもの、束縛するもの全般を指します。過去分詞形として形容詞的に使われることも多いです。","priority":"★★★"},"common_mistakes":{"examples":[{"incorrect":"✗ He was shackled from his dreams.","correct":"✓ He was shackled by his responsibilities.","note":"比喩的な意味で「shackled」を使う場合、通常は「by」という前置詞を使います。"},{"incorrect":"✗ The shackled man was freed. He was now unshackled.","correct":"✓ The shackled man was freed. He was now unshackled.","note":"「unshackled」は「足かせを外された」「束縛から解放された」という意味で、解放された状態を表す正しい表現です。"}],"priority":"★★☆"},"related_words":{"derivatives":["shackle (名詞: 足かせ、手かせ、束縛するもの; 動詞: 束縛する)","unshackled (形容詞: 束縛されていない、自由な)"],"idioms_phrases":["cast off one's shackles (束縛を打ち破る)"],"priority":"★★☆"},"level_frequency":{"CEFR":"C1","frequency_google_ngram":"比較的低頻度 (Relatively low frequency) - 文学作品や歴史的な文脈でよく見られる。","priority":"★☆☆"},"readability_explanation":{"level":"C1","text":"「**shackled**」は、物理的に足かせや手かせで拘束されている状態、または比喩的に自由や行動を制限されている状態を表す単語です。例えば、囚人が「shackled（足かせをはめられている）」状態や、官僚主義によって会社が「shackled（束縛されている）」状態を表現できます。比喩的な意味合いで使われることが多く、ややフォーマルな語彙です。"},"example_sentences":[{"sentence":"The **shackled** slaves were forced to work in the fields.","translation":"足かせをはめられた奴隷たちは、畑での労働を強制された。","type":"adjective","meaning_category":"足かせをはめられた"},{"sentence":"His creativity was **shackled** by the rigid rules of the organization.","translation":"彼の創造性は、組織の厳格な規則によって束縛されていた。","type":"verb (past participle used as adjective)","meaning_category":"束縛された"},{"sentence":"They **shackled** the prisoner to prevent him from escaping.","translation":"彼らは囚人が逃げないように足かせで拘束した。","type":"verb (past simple)","meaning_category":"束縛する"},{"sentence":"The country's economy is **shackled** by debt.","translation":"その国の経済は負債によって束縛されている。","type":"verb (past participle used as adjective)","meaning_category":"束縛された"},{"sentence":"She felt **shackled** by her family obligations.","translation":"彼女は家族の義務に縛られていると感じた。","type":"verb (past participle used as adjective)","meaning_category":"束縛された"}]}
